about.title: ABOUT US
about.text: STUDENT-CHAT is a modern educational platform created to support students at all stages of learning and preparation for university admission. We combine technology and expert experience to deliver effective and personalized education.

hero.title: STUDENT CHAT
hero.subtitle: a place of help — for whom?

communication.title: Communication and support
communication.text: We are not just an information platform — we are a place where everyone can share experience and get inspired.

flexibility.title: Learning flexibility
flexibility.text: You choose how to study: online classes, tests, or recorded lessons.

skills.title: Skill development
skills.text: In addition to admission, we help develop skills useful in life and studies.

big.title: 24/7 Availability
big.text: We're always here! You can ask questions, get support, and find answers whenever it's convenient for you.

green.title: Safe and friendly space
green.text: We strive to make communication on the platform comfortable. Here, you can be yourself and share ideas without fear.

pink.title: Best mentors
pink.text: Experienced specialists will help you understand complex topics and prepare for important exams.
